meanings.definition: An area or place for camping.
meanings.sent1: We set up our tent at the campgrounds near the lake.
meanings.sent2: Families enjoy spending time together at the campgrounds during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels at the campgrounds are quite friendly and love to steal snacks!
meanings.sent4: The campgrounds were a bustling village of tents and campfires.
meanings.sent5: The campgrounds were filled with the sounds of laughter and crackling fires.

meanings.definition: A place where people can pitch tents or park RVs for overnight stays.
meanings.sent1: The campgrounds offer a safe and peaceful place for travelers to rest.
meanings.sent2: Many families prefer staying at campgrounds rather than hotels for a more natural experience.
meanings.sent3: At night, the campgrounds transform into a twinkling wonderland of stars and lanterns.
meanings.sent4: The campgrounds resembled a colorful mosaic of tents and RVs under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The campgrounds provided a cozy spot for weary travelers to recharge and relax.
